## WorldEventPayloads."WORLD.SET\_DIRECTIONAL\_LIGHT\_COLOR" property

Emitted when the color of the world's directional light is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[WorldEvent.SET_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT_COLOR]: {
        world: World;
        color: RgbColor;
    };
```
